This shirt has been a great addition to my fall wardrobe. It’s comfortable and has a nice casual fit. There are several fall colors to chose from.

I love this shirt. It’s flattering and pretty. The colors are vibrant and the sleeve detail gives it a dressy stylish vibe. I normally wear a large, medium if the item runs big or is a loose fit. I don’t like things too boxy or baggy fitting. I ordered a medium based on others reviews and it fits perfectly. Still a bit roomy but not baggy or loose.

评论概述: Stylish and Comfortable Blouse for Work or Casual Wear
评论详情: This blouse has quickly become one of my favorite pieces for both work and casual outings. The pleated design adds a touch of elegance, making it perfect for the office or dressing up for an event. The fabric is lightweight and comfortable, yet it feels durable and well-made.  The fit is flattering, and it drapes nicely without feeling too tight or restrictive. It pairs beautifully with slacks, skirts, or even jeans for a more casual look. The long sleeves are perfect for fall weather, and the overall style is versatile enough to be dressed up or down.  Highly recommend this top for anyone looking for a stylish yet comfortable addition to their wardrobe!

评论概述: Flattering and Trendy: The Perfect Crewneck for me
评论详情: This grey crewneck long-sleeve shirt is my second purchase in this style. The loose fit and pleated neck and chest detail are very flattering for my body type. I am 5-4," 195 lbs, and 38DD, so attracting the eye to my chess is something I watch out for, especially when I am looking for a relaxed styling, as it can make me look and feel larger. This shirt fits amazingly, and the vertical lines of the pleats elongate your torso. It has smocked cuffs, which I love as I can tuck it in to below my elbow, which helps with body visual proportions and makes me look lighter and taller. This shirt is a versatile piece that effortlessly transitions from a professional business look to a relaxed weekend style. Pair it with tailored pants and a blazer for the office, then switch to jeans and sneakers for a casual weekend outing.

Just reminds me kind of like a hippie-ish vibe. So the material itself is pretty soft and comfortable. The sleeves would be my favorite part because they are ribbed cuffs. So basically the sleeves make this top. So the top itself doesn't really do your body any justice. It's not slim fitting or anything. It fits kind of baggy and loose. I don't care for the lines in the front of the top I don't understand them or what their purpose serves. Like I said the best part about this top is the sleeves.
The color and fit are really nice for almost any occasion. It's super comfy, cute and easy to pair with pants/jeans.

This top is so cute! It is true to the product description image and true to size. It is a looser fit that drapes nicely. I have worn quite a few times now as well as washed and line dried with no issues. I will be ordering more colors in this top!!

I really like the way this ANRABESS Dressy Casual Long Sleeve Pleated Sweater in my favorite color of purple can work just as well at work when worn with a pair of dress slacks or a skirt, or casually when coupled with a faded pair of jeans. Whatever my preference happens to be, this sweater will meet it well. The cut is flattering without being clingy, fits true to the size chart, and I love the feminine, cuffed sleeves! Definitely recommend!
I sent this back because of the size was just a little too small for me
I loved wearing it to Paisley Park near Minneapolis Minnesota to see the Prince museum... Perfect

This top is super cute and could be styled to be more dressy for work or social functions or casually running errands. The neckline pleats and cinched wrists gives it a lot of fun detail. The fabric is nice and lightweight, perfect for summer evenings or going into fall. The color is beautiful and looks exactly like the photos and the cut of this is on the flowy side but it runs true to size.

I like this shirt.  It is loose fitting and slightly flowy towards the bottom.  The pleats at the neckline help make it a little more dressy along with the ruffled cuffs.  I am a tall woman, so the sleeves don't fit length wise but I still enjoy the shirt because I simply push the sleeves up towards my elbows and the shirt still looks fashionable.  This shirt will work with jeans or dress pants and make every occasion worth.

I was a bit disappointed in this shirt, it's just very plain and sort of boxy. Didn't do my figure any favors as it's sort of flowy in not right ways. I think it's fine, like others have said, for just a casual shirt around the house or running errands, but it's definitely not a "nice shirt"!

This top is too big and baggy. It doesn't look horribly bad. I do like the color. It does feel comfortable but I will probably just wear this around the house if at all.  I usually wear 16w to 18w in pants and 2x in shirts. My bra size is 42ddd and this 2x is just too big. I recommend sizing down of you want a more flattering fit.

评论概述: OK as a casual long-sleeve t-shirt
评论详情: This shirt is ok. The color is a nice burgundy and the material is soft and comfortable. The ends of the sleeves have an elastic cinching, but that feels comfy as well. I'm not crazy about the lines stitched down the front and overall, I think the style is very casual. It reminds me of a pajama top. I will probably wear this around the house in the winter but likely won't wear it out.

This is a very nice long sleeve t-shirt selection. I chose the medium burgundy.  Pros: >> True to size. >> Fabric is soft and comfortable. >> Washes up great. >> Dries without wrinkles. >> Color matches pictures. >> Pleated neck makes it dressier than normal long sleeve t-shirt. >> Unique cinch wrists are a nice touch. >> Price is very reasonable! >> Great for house, school, or casual work settings.  Cons: >> None that I can identify.
Good quality and fits nice and great price

评论概述: Cute, soft top- perfect for fall!
评论详情: I am really happy with this top. The color is pretty, the length is great, and the detailing makes it stand out versus a plain long sleeve tee. This is nice because it can be dressed up or down. The shirt feels well made. It’s soft and slightly stretchy. I also like the cuffed sleeves; it give the shirt a cozy feel. I float between a S and M; I went with the Small and I’m glad that I did. Perfect fit. For reference, I’m 5’5” and 153 with an athletic build.

..And that disappoints me. A little too wide of a neck opening that is not very structured either, so it tends to resemble more of a neck stretched out accidentally instead of that's the way this design was made. The neckline is not very flattering and for that reason, I'm giving this 3 stars. The color however is gorgeous.

I really like the pleated neck design.  I ordered several short sleeve shirts with this pleated design and was happy to see long sleeve shirts with the same pleated design coming out for fall.  The pleats dress up the top and give a visual appeal that is feminine and graceful.  The smocked cuffs add to the feminine and graceful style of the shirt.  The cuffs are not too tight for my average size wrist.  The material is soft and stretchy--just what I want for a casual top.  I ordered the top in cadet blue and it is true to the color in the advertising photos.  I ordered a size medium following the size chart--this is true to the chart and fits great!  I usually wear a size 8/10 (medium) but I did recently order a similar top as this and according to that size chart I was a small.  That small was perfect, and so I almost went with a small for this top but so glad I stuck with the size chart as a medium is perfect for me and so I am pretty sure a small would have been snug!
My wife loves the sleeves and the fit. sizing is accurate and it is well-made. She really likes the color of the material and can be used casual or dressy.

I was worried about how I would like the sleeves on this shirt, but I decided to try it anyways. I'm so glad I did. This shirt is so comfortable. The weird cuffs at the end of the sleeves aren't constricting, itchy, or annoying, they just keep your sleeves in place and give the top an interesting look. I like the pleat stitching at the top. If you are chesty, I think these lines help to give a minimizing look while also creating texture. The fabric on this shirt is very soft and thin enough to be comfortable on a warm day. I'm 5'5, about 140lbs, I usually wear a med and size 8-10, and I ordered a med and it fit perfectly.

I get hot and this is a nice long sleeve light weight very true to size fit, i wear a size 2 waist so this was a little loose around the waist but it was a nice fit and flowy. Color was nice and comfortable.
Perfect for dressing up or down. Can be casual or business attire. Very nice color. Not too thin or thick.
Really cute top, looks good with jeans, or dress pants.

This color is pretty and, to me, seems similar to the color on screen. The shirt fabric is soft and the style is different enough to wear for casual dress up or down. I like to pair my top with jeans and boots. This top seems affordable for the quality. I might get another one in a different color.

While this is more on the side of 't-shirt material' than I was expecting, I really do like this top! Like another reviewer, I also ordered several short-sleeve shirts with this pleated design. The pleats really do give the tops a touch of sophistication, making them more feminine and elegant appearance. This fits TTS, and is very soft and comfy. Highly recommend!
The shirt fit as expected. It is made of a breathable material. I washed it before wearing it, and the black color held up.
